description: mounted on cardboard; Mary holding and looking at baby Jesus with Joseph at right looking on
inscription:
Inscription, Stamp and Label

at bottom center on mount, in graphite: [CANTARINI CIRCLE]; in brown ink: [TIZIAN. VECELLIO. / 1477.-1576.]; on back of mount , in pencil: [From collection of Robert Udny of Udny (illegible) / 1725-1802. (see Fagan no 453 / sales 1802 and 1804]; in different hand: [H139356]; and [Titian / coll. Robert Udny 1725-1802 / Sales 1802-1804 Lugt No. 2248 / See (illegible) No 453]
markings: LRC of mount, stamped in black: [RU] Lugt 2248; on back of mount: catalogue clipping
medium: Pen and brown ink over black chalk
provenance: Robert Udny, Lugt 2248 (1722-1802), London and Teddington. Victor Winthrop Newman, cf. Lugt 2540 (1860-1920/30'), without collector's mark, but inscribed on mount, New York. Sale, Sotheby's, London, July 4, 1994, part of no. 129 (with Volmarijn and van Vianem drawings), for Â£750, to Moir; Alfred Moir, Santa Barbara (1994-d. 2010; bequeathed to MIA)
title: Holy Family
